abstract: Jim Prentice, former premier of Alberta, Canada, dies in plane crash in British Columbia, along with three other passengers.

headline.print_headline: Former Alberta Premier, Widely Respected, Dies in Plane Crash
headline.main: Jim Prentice, Former Premier of Alberta, Dies in Plane Crash

snippet: Mr. Prentice, who also served in the cabinet of former Prime Minister Stephen Harper, was a widely respected moderate Conservative in Canada politics....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Prentice, who also served in the cabinet of former Prime Minister Stephen Harper, was a widely respected moderate Conservative in Canada politics.
